data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Rainato, Alessio, Pellizzari, Giuseppina (2008): Redescription of the adult male and description of second-instar male, prepupa and pupa of Ceroplastes japonicus Green (Hemiptera: Coccoidea: Coccidae). Zootaxa 1895: 25-38, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.184431
